definition: To refrain from engaging in or experiencing something undesirable, often with the intention of preventing harm, negative consequences, or conflict. This word is commonly used when discussing actions taken to avoid or prevent certain situations, behaviors, or outcomes.

examples.german: Um Krankheiten zu vermeiden, wasche ich mir regelmäßig die Hände.
examples.english: To prevent illnesses, I regularly wash my hands.

examples.german: Um Verletzungen zu vermeiden, trage ich immer einen Helm beim Fahrradfahren.
examples.english: To avoid injuries, I always wear a helmet when cycling.
